How this thing works

Soil Humidity Sensor

The Soil Humidity Sensor gives us an analog output variable voltage reading that allows us to estimate the moisture content of soil. Because of this we can tell you either "Yes the plant has enough water" or "No, the plant needs watering".

Raspberry Pi

The Raspberry Pi is a credit-card-size computer that plugs into your TV and a keyboard. It is a capable little computer which can be used in electronic projects. We have programmed it to tell us how much water and sun your plants are getting.

Drupl App

With the Drupl App you can read the output of the Raspberry Pi. In an enjoyable way, ofcourse. You can add all your plant friends to the app to have a nice overview of how they are doing. You can also see how well you are taking care of your plants. Water your plants and earn achievements!
